summary: Texture replacer for female dragon plate armor which is a bit more revealing
descriptionHtml:
AURABEAT\'S Revealing Dragon Plate Armor


DESCRIPTION

This mod is a texture replacer for female dragon plate armor which is a bit more revealing. I made this after not seeing any dragon plate texture replacements that I liked. This is my first attempt at modding but I think it came out well enought to share. There are some minor issues of transparent textures around the waist, but its barely noticable. Let me know what you think.   

INSTALLING

Once you have downloaded and extracted the mod, simply place the folders named \"textures\" and \"meshes\" into your Skyrim \"Data\" folder. For most of you, this will be: 

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

UNINSTALLING

To uninstall, simply enter the \"Data\" folder in your Skyrim directory, then enter \"textures\" and \"armor\" then delete the folder named \"dragonbone\".

PLEASE NOTE

This mod replaces the texture of the female dragon plate armor, so as long as this mod is installed you will not see the original version in game.
author: Aurabeat
